alert.note: Alert for Clay; Jackson; Laurel; Owsley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 3:50PM EDT until May 16 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Laurel County in south central Kentucky... Central Owsley County in southeastern Kentucky... Southern Jackson County in southeastern Kentucky... Northwestern Clay County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 350 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Green Hill, or 9 miles south of McKee, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Welchburg around 355 PM EDT. Shepherdtown around 400 PM EDT. Malcomb around 405 PM EDT. Chestnutburg around 410 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Thomas and Trixie. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
